title: ARDEE INDUSTRIES aluminum can trading website

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for a company named "ARDEE INDUSTRIES" focused on aluminum can trading, with clear navigation and English user-facing text.

quotes:
Create a website named ARDEE INDUSTRIES 
For Aluminum can trading

acceptanceCriteria: The site header prominently displays "ARDEE INDUSTRIES"
The site renders well on mobile and desktop (no horizontal scrolling at common breakpoints)
All visible UI text is in English

requirements.text: Implement core pages/sections relevant to aluminum can trading: Home (overview), Trading (how it works / what is traded), About, and Contact/Inquiry.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can reach Home, Trading, About, and Contact/Inquiry from the main navigation
Each page/section contains non-placeholder, domain-relevant copy for aluminum can trading

requirements.text: Add an Inquiry form for aluminum can trading requests that collects: name, company (optional), email or phone, inquiry type (Buy / Sell / Partnership), location (optional), estimated quantity (optional), message, and consent checkbox; validate required fields client-side and show success/error states.
acceptanceCriteria: The form prevents submission when required fields are missing and shows inline validation messages
On successful submission, a confirmation message is shown and the form resets
On failure, an error message is shown without losing the user-entered text

requirements.text: Create backend persistence for Inquiry submissions in the single Motoko main actor, including: createInquiry, listInquiries (admin-only), and getInquiry (admin-only).
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting an Inquiry from the frontend stores a new record in the backend
An admin-only method can list all stored inquiries
Non-admin callers cannot list or fetch inquiry details

requirements.text: Add an admin area in the frontend that uses Internet Identity login and allows an authenticated admin to view submitted inquiries in a list and open a details view.

quotes: Create a website named ARDEE INDUSTRIES

acceptanceCriteria: Admin login uses the existing Internet Identity integration (without modifying immutable hook files)
After login, the admin can view a list of inquiries (most recent first)
Admin can open an inquiry to view all its fields

requirements.text: Define a coherent, distinctive visual theme for ARDEE INDUSTRIES and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, buttons, cards, and page layout (avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors).

quotes: Create a website named ARDEE INDUSTRIES

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette and typographic scale is used across all pages
Primary/secondary button styles are consistent and reused
The overall theme is not primarily blue/purple

requirements.text: Add required generated static images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., logo and hero visuals) without routing images through the backend.

quotes: Create a website named ARDEE INDUSTRIES

acceptanceCriteria: Images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames
At least the logo and hero image are displayed on the site
No backend endpoints are used to serve generated images

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable frontend hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Real-time chat, WebSockets, or push notifications.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
External databases or non-Motoko backend services.

required: Hero background illustration featuring aluminum cans / recycled aluminum texture in an industrial style (hero-aluminum-trading.dim_1920x900.png)
Seamless pattern texture of aluminum cans or aluminum surface (aluminum-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)
